column4: how i change default startup services in ubuntu 10.04 and add my custom programs there so that those program can start during boot time?
dependng on what your progerams are doing. You could launch them from /etc/rc.local
if i want to stop sshd, telnetd from starting during boot time what should i do ?
rename the /etc/init/servicenameyouwant.conf to  whatever.dontrun is one way i recall.
